snippet: Jury selection in the murder trial of Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, the Fort Hood shooting suspect, began Tuesday with the first group of 20 potential jurors.
abstract: Six Army officers are dismissed as potential jurors on first day of jury selection in murder trial of Maj Nidal Malik Hasan, Fort Hood shooting suspect.
lead_paragraph: Jury selection in the murder trial of Maj. Nidal Malik Hasan, the Fort Hood shooting suspect, began Tuesday with the first group of 20 potential jurors.

headline.main: Six Possible Jurors Dismissed in Fort Hood Shooting Case
headline.print_headline: Six Possible Jurors Dismissed In Fort Hood Shooting Case
